schemes are required to best present a dataset to a modeling algorithm. Rather than guess, grid
search and decide based on real results. Some data preparation schemes to consider include:
 Diﬀerencing to remove a trend.
 Seasonal diﬀerencing to remove seasonality.
 Standardize to center.
 Normalize to rescale.
 Power Transform to make normal.
This large amount of systematic searching can be slow to execute. Some ideas to speed up
